summary: An Ordinance authorizing an amendment to the agreement between the City and the Seattle/King County Convention and Visitors Bureau (C.F. 275539, 278492) to increase the annual consideration paid by the City under said agreement and to require the Seattle/King County Convention and Visitors Bureau to perform certain additional specified services during 1976 in solicitation of national conventions and out-of-state tourist travel for Seattle in connection with convention and other facilities at the Seattle Center.
